document.full_text: the alabama fan accused of poisoning his rival school's trees said on a birmingham radio show that he is going to get what he deserves and that he just has 'too much 'bama in me.'
document.title: auburn tree poisoning suspect goes on radio show
lines_and_colors: the alabama fan accused of poisoning his rival school's trees said on a birmingham radio show that he is going to get what he deserves and that he just has 'too much 'bama in me.'
